scene.actorcontainer



abstract interface ActorContainer;
Interface for classes that contain, or manage actor. Currently implemented by SceneManager.

abstract void add_actor(Actor actor);
Add a new actor.

Params:
Actor actor Actor to add. Must not already be in the container.

abstract void remove_actor(Actor actor);
Remove an actor.

Params:
Actor actor Actor to remove. Must be in the container.
